Perform Sentiment And Emotion Analysis of Emotion of customers by their Complains/ Feedbacks/Comments/Hashtags in an app like Food delivery apps, Online retail Websites and Prioritising them according to users sentiment.

Sentiment analysis (or opinion mining) is a natural language processing technique used to determine whether data is positive, negative or neutral. Sentiment analysis is often performed on textual data to help businesses monitor brand and product sentiment in customer feedback, and understand customer needs.
